mapper.select: SELECT A.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ ROOM_TYPE_SEQ, A.ROOM_SEQ ROOM_SEQ, A.ROOM_TYPE_TITLE ROOM_TYPE_TITLE, A.ROOM_TYPE_DESC ROOM_TYPE_DESC, A.WEEKDAY_AMT WEEKDAY_AMT, A.WEEKEND_AMT WEEKEND_AMT, A.ROOM_CHECK_IN_DT ROOM_CHECK_IN_DT, A.ROOM_CHECK_OUT_DT ROOM_CHECK_OUT_DT, A.ROOM_CHECK_IN_TIME ROOM_CHECK_IN_TIME, A.ROOM_CHECK_OUT_TIME ROOM_CHECK_OUT_TIME, A.MAX_GUESTS MAX_GUESTS, A.MIN_DAY MIN_DAY, A.MAX_DAY MAX_DAY, A.REG_DT REG_DT, A.UPDATE_DT UPDATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(RSV_SEQ) FROM RESERVATION B WHERE B.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ = A.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ AND TO_DATE(B.RSV_CHECK_IN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(B.RSV_CHECK_OUT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') > TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYYMMDD') ) RESERVATION_CHECK FROM ROOM_TYPE A WHERE ROOM_SEQ = #{roomSeq}
